segments.text: Tell me something about your Valentine's Day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , on that day , boys usually give roses to the sweet hearts and girls give them chocolate in return .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So romantic.young people must have lot of fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , that is what the holiday is for , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2
